Ultimate Patagonia Adventure

Experience the thrill of Patagonia's rugged terrain on this adventure-packed tour. Climb the Fitz Roy Range, trek through Torres del Paine, and raft the Rio Baker. Ideal for adrenaline seekers looking to explore the vast wilderness and stunning landscapes of Patagonia.

Detailed Itinerary with Highlights and Activities

  • Day 1: Arrival in El Calafate, orientation.
  • Day 2-3: Trekking in Los Glaciares National Park, viewing the Perito Moreno Glacier.
  • Day 4-5: Mountaineering in Fitz Roy Range.
  • Day 6-7: Rafting in Rio Baker.
  • Day 8-9: Horseback riding in Torres del Paine.
  • DDay 10: Departure.

Inclusions

Accommodation in eco-lodges, all adventure equipment, all meals, transportation, professional guides.

Pricing and Availability

Pricing varies based on accommodation choice and season. Customizable options available.
